CustomField.description: This field value represents unique account IDs generated by "other" internal active or legacy systems from which the account record exists. In CLMA, the value must always be prefaced by a 3-letter acronym and hyphen which represent the system which established the id, and include any/all leading zeroes (ex. "P58-1000000536" or "P45-0010013589"). This field is intended to help users identify the accounts by allowing them to search CLMA for the system UUIDs with which they are most familiar.
CustomField.label: Other UUIDs with External System Ref
